text: Michael Eamon Beahan (21 January 1937 â€“ 30 January 2022) was a British-born Australian Labor politician. He was the 19th President of the Australian Senate from 1 February 1994 to 30 June 1996. He was a Senator representing Western Australia in the Australian Senate from 1987 to 1996. Beahan was born in London, England. Beahan was appointed a Member of the Order of Australia on Australia Day 2011. Beahan died on 30 January 2022 in Melbourne, Australia, nine days after his 85th birthday. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Presidents of the Australian Senate Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia Category:Politicians from Western Australia Category:Politicians from London
title: Michael Beahan
